summary: The document is an FBI identification form from the JFK Assassination Records Collection, detailing surveillance on the Mannarino brothers and their associate Thomas Anthony Ciancutti in Pittsburgh, PA. It focuses on their gambling and shylocking activities, including the takeover of Lloyds, Limited, suspected as a front for illegal operations. Marked as unclassified, the document was originally dated September 27, 1961, and last reviewed on August 10, 1998.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK Assassination Records Collection.
It details the FBI's surveillance of the Mannarino brothers and Thomas Anthony Ciancutti in relation to gambling and shylocking.
Highlights the takeover of Lloyds, Limited as a strategic move to expand their illegal operations in Pittsburgh.
Identifies Thomas Anthony Ciancutti as a central figure in these activities.
Originally dated September 27, 1961, with a last review date of August 10, 1998.
